programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Surua riittaa tutkija Labradan yrittaessa pelastaa omistajiensa hylkaaman sairaan koiran. Nuori tytto pelastaa hevosen, joka on jatetty ilman ruokaa ja vetta.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Omistajat Lisa ja Callu pelkaavat tanskandogginsa Merlinin puolesta, silla se kavelee etuvarpaillaan. Neurologi Annette Wessman epailee vikaa koiran selkarangassa tai kallossa.

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kalastaja-tutkimusretkeilija Jeremy Wade matkustaa maailmalla pyydystamassa mahdollisimman monta erikoista lajia. Mita miehen koukkuun tarttuu?

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Fisherman and adventurer, Jeremy Wade, travels to South Africa, in search of some of the world’s most unusual fish. What will he discover?

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Pennsylvanian elaintensuojeluyhdistys auttaa takkuturkkista kulkukoiraa. Kissa, jonka kaulassa on suuri reika, kiidatetaan hoitoon.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Riutunut koira, joka painaa vain kolmanneksen normaalista painostaan, tuodaan elainsuojaan, ja tiimi auttaa kissaa, jonka jalka on juuttunut kaulukseen jo useita kuukausia sitten.

programme.title: Eramaan laki
programme.desc: Kala- ja villielainpoliisit pyrkivat vapauttamaan uhkaavan karhun takaisin omaan elinymparistoonsa. Samalla pidatetaan myos rattikuski.

programme.title: Pandamonium
programme.desc: Kevaan kiima-aika on alkanut, ja vuosittain taytyy syntya 15 pentua pandapopulaation sailymiseksi. Matkaamme myos Qinling-vuorille tarkkailemaan villipandoja.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Osa kaupunkilaisista on kyllastynyt hetkisen maailman sykkeeseen ja haluaa muttaa maalle. Maaseudulla asumisessa on kuitenkin erilaisia haasteita. Niinpa apuun kiitaa eras erityinen perhe.

programme.title: Villi Australia
programme.desc: Australian mantereella sijaitsee maailman suurin kesyton luonnonalue. Alkuperaiskansat ovat elaneet siella tarkkailemalla luontoa ja ottamalla siita oppia.

programme.title: Villi Australia
programme.desc: Australian mantereella sijaitsee maailman suurin kesyton luonnonalue. Alkuperaiskansat ovat elaneet siella tarkkailemalla luontoa ja ottamalla siita oppia.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Irtokoiranpentujen ensimmaiset elinviikot Thaimaassa ovat vaaroja taynna. Kathmandussa koiria palvotaan ja ne puetaan kukkaseppeleisiin Tihar-festivaalin kunniaksi.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff kay ilmaisklinikalla ja tuo auton alle jaaneen koiran hoitoon. Toisella koiralla on mystinen myhkyra. Elainlaakari Baier haluaa pelastetun pennun omakseen.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Paul de Gelder ja James Glancy hyppaavat lentokoneesta kilometrin korkeudesta kokeillakseen millaista on syoksya maailman kaukaisimmille haita kuhiseville vesille.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Ohjelmasarja Pennsylvanian elainsuojeluyhdistyksesta. Tutkijat loytavat kahdeksan koiraa, jotka on kahlittu 22 kilon metalliketjuihin.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Dokumentaarinen sarja seuraa Pennsylvaniassa toimivan SPCA´s Humane Law Enforcementin tyota kaltoinkohdeltujen elaimien hyvaksi.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Muusikko Loun ja hanen kumppaninsa Staceyn tilaa uhkaavat veden aiheuttama eroosio ja rankkasateen aiheuttamat vakavat vahingot. Raneyt saapuvat apuun.

programme.title: Wild Dubai
programme.desc: Modernin Dubain taakse katkeytyy salaisuus: uskomaton villi luonto, joka kantaa ajatonta yhteytta aavikkoon, mereen ja kansan historiaan ja perinteeseen.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat uivat alligaattorivesissa pelastaakseen vammautuneen alligaattorin. Miamin tahan mennessa suurimmassa kaappauksessa maatilalta pelastetaan 400 elainta!

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff tekee kaikkensa pelastaakseen auto-onnettomuuteen joutuneen koiran jalat. Uusi eksoottisten elainten laakari tohtori Baier hoitaa laihtuvaa Burman pythonia.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Irtokoiranpentujen ensimmaiset elinviikot Thaimaassa ovat vaaroja taynna. Kathmandussa koiria palvotaan ja ne puetaan kukkaseppeleisiin Tihar-festivaalin kunniaksi.

programme.title: Pandamonium
programme.desc: Kiinan Wolong Panda Reserve -suojelualueen pandoja on kuvattu vuoden ajan. Alueella tehdyn uraauurtavan tutkimuksen ansiosta siella on syntynyt 16 pentua.

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Nelja ihmisryhmaa pudotetaan keskelle Alaskan eramaata. Uutta kotia etsiessaan he kohtaavat karhuja, jaatikoita ja omat pelkonsa.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Seitsenlapsinen Brownien perhe elaa syvalla Alaskan eramaassa, sivilisaation ja sahkoverkkojen ulkopuolella, missa selviytyminen riippuu hyvasta keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Matkalla elainlaakariksi
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan kuuden elainlaakariopiskelijan elamaa ja opintoja heidan viimeisena opiskeluvuotenaan. Tulevien elainlaakareiden hoivissa apua saavat kaikenkarvaiset elaimet koosta riippumatta. (Life at Vet U, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Koirat ovat kehittyneet villeista saalistajista lempeiksi lemmikeiksi. Tietyissa osissa maailmaa koiria hemmotellaan niin kuin pikkulapsia.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Matka maailman ympari nayttaa, miten koirasta tuli maailman arvostetuimpiin elaimiin kuuluva laji. Ihmisen parhaan ystavan tarina kulkee villipedosta lempeaksi lemmikiksi.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff hoitaa epatavallisesta vaivasta karsivaa savannikissaa. Tiimi kiitaa pyydystamaan irtokoiran, joka juoksee valtatieta kohti.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Tiimi hoitaa hylattyja kissoja. Elainlaakari Jeff valaa uskoa huolestuneeseen omistajaan, jonka koiralla on todettu syopa. Pelastettu tiikeri rakastuu.

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing The World
programme.desc: Ohjelmassa seurataan alansa parhaita ja alykkaimpia tutkijoita, insinooreja, yrittajia ja keksijoita, jotka tekevat uraauurtavaa tyota etsiessaan seuraavia mullistavia keksintoja.

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing The World
programme.desc: Ohjelmassa seurataan alansa parhaita ja alykkaimpia tutkijoita, insinooreja, yrittajia ja keksijoita, jotka tekevat uraauurtavaa tyota etsiessaan seuraavia mullistavia keksintoja.

programme.title: Saba And The Rhinos Secret
programme.desc: Seikkaileva villielainten asiantuntija Saba Douglas-Hamilton lahtee erikoiselle matkalle: paljastamaan sarvikuonon todellisen luonteen ja salaisen elaman.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 2 osa 6/12. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet , tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi.

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kalamies ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade etsii Italian Garda-jarvelta 1500-luvun hirviokalaa. Millaisia salaisuuksia jarven pinnan alle katkeytyy?

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: UUSI SARJA! Kausi 1, osa 1. Biologi, kalastaja ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade matkustaa ympari maailmaa tutkimaan vesistoja ja vesielamaa. Tutkimuskohteisiin lukeutuvat muun muassa havainnot myyttisista vesihirvioista seka alueet, joilta tietyt kalalajit ovat yhtakkia kadonneet. (Jeremy Wades Dark Waters, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Elaimet pystyvat uskomattomiin tekoihin, mutta miten? Tutkijat paljastavat elainten valtakunnan salaisuuksia, yllattavia totuuksia ja esittavat hammastyttavaa kuvamateriaalia.

programme.desc: Wild Mexico

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Tappava dieetti. Rontgenkuva on tarkea todiste kolmen nalkiintyneen koiran tutkimuksessa. Tutkija AJ vaatii omistajaa kertomaan, mita taman koirat ovat syoneet.

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Kolme hantaa. AHS:n tutkijat avustavat 80-henkista poliisitiimia kukkotappeluratsiassa. Myohemmin he loytavat kolme koiraa, joiden hannat on julmasti typistetty.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Asiantuntijat tutkivat uutta teoriaa Skotlannin Loch Nessin hirviosta. Olento voi olla paitsi todellinen, myos mahdollisesti vaarallisempi kuin on edes kuviteltu.

programme.title: Adrift: 47 Days with Sharks
programme.desc: Toisen maailmansodan lentajat Louis Zamperini ja Russell Phillips selviytyivat 47 paivaa haita kuhisevilla vesilla heidan koneensa pudottua Tyyneen Valtamereen.

programme.title: Wild Dubai
programme.desc: Modernin Dubain taakse katkeytyy salaisuus: uskomaton villi luonto, joka kantaa ajatonta yhteytta aavikkoon, mereen ja kansan historiaan ja perinteeseen.

programme.title: Meet The Penguins
programme.desc: Leopardien iso hyokkays Kapkaupungin lahella tappaa kolmekymmenta pingviinia. Riistanvalvojat kiidattavat ainoan eloonjaaneen Sanccobiin, mutta jaako se henkiin?

programme.title: Meet The Orangutans
programme.desc: Seuraa orpojen orankivauvojen elamaa Borneossa, kun ne tuodaan kasvamaan maailman vanhimpaan orankien turvapaikkaan ennen kuin ne palautetaan takaisin luontoon.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Paul de Gelder ja James Glancy hyppaavat lentokoneesta kilometrin korkeudesta kokeillakseen millaista on syoksya maailman kaukaisimmille haita kuhiseville vesille.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story

programme.title: Secret Amazon: Into The Wild
programme.desc: As Lucy and her Indigenous team begin their unique 50-day journey into virgin Amazon rainforest, they can hear the whistling of the deadly bushmaster snake...

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo has a modern edition of his Bradshaws Continental Handbook, dated 1936. His destination lies close to his heart: the ancient kingdom of Spain and land of his father.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark
programme.desc: Steve Backshall is on a mission to create a new generation of shark saviours, but first he needs to find his team. Steve takes 12 young UK hopefuls to boot camp.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: From Douro to Sintra. Join us on a journey through some very British parts of Portugal. We start at the Douro railway and a winery that produces port wine before exploring how the royal families of England and Portugal became connected. Aveiro offers salted cod before the journey continues on a CP300 locomotive to Lisbon and a classic cream tart. Sintras magical palaces are the final destination of this episode.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben journeys to the freezing coastal waters of Iceland to live with Hakon, a former carpenter who overcame alcohol and embraced a clean, solo life in the wilderness on an private island.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The warm season provides for Alaskans.

programme.title: Tutankhamun with Dan Snow
programme.desc: In this episode, we unravel the riddle of Tutankhamuns unusually small tomb and reveal how Tut mania, the craze of King Tut gripped the world.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits a factory with a menthol scent. The Polos factory in York produces 32 million every single day. They have been churning out these little holey wonders since 1948.

programme.title: Wonders of the Solar System
programme.desc: Episode looking at the sun - the powerhouse of our solar system.

programme.title: Spy in the Ocean
programme.desc: A new generation of spy creatures search the ocean for intelligent life and find ways of thinking that have to be seen to be believed. The most complex spy creature ever built films the owner of the largest brains on the planet – sperm whales. Spy Whale is the same size as a new-born whale calf and is equipped with an array of cameras. It even has a hydrophone to capture their calls. In a magical close encounter, Spy Whale is greeted by an inquisitive female who, in astonishing scenes, attempts to communicate. In a touching sign of acceptance, she even introduces her calf to Spy Whale. Getting to know the greatest mind in the invertebrate world requires a very different spy, one that’s a dead ringer for the coconut octopus it’s designed to meet. The octopus not only has a central brain; it also has a brain in each of its arms. Using its combined brainpower, it works out how best to steal a coconut shell carried by our spy. Its plan is to use the shell as a door to its hideaway to protect itself from predatory sharks. In another act of ingenuity, it improvises a shield and throws missiles at a rival octopus. It also shows a softer and more emotional side when it gives Spy Coconut Octopus a friendly and lingering embrace. In Thailand, Spy Macaque joins ocean-diving macaques as they forage underwater for seafood. Our spy captures a filming-first as the macaques catch fish with their bare hands. To break open oysters, they also use stone tools including our very own spy rock. In Japan, Spy Puffer becomes an artist’s assistant to a male Japanese puffer fish as he crafts exquisite sand sculptures in a quest to woo a mate. When he runs out of shells to use as decoration, Spy Puffer comes to the rescue, finding shells for the male to complete his masterpiece, enough to impress the most demanding art critic of all – his mate. Intelligence gathers pace when Spy Sea Lion meets the world’s fastest fish and the sea lions that hunt them. Marlin use teamwork to drive mackerel shoals to the surface only for them to be stolen by quick-thinking sea lions. When Spy Sea Lion takes us on a rollercoaster ride inside the shoal, its camera eyes show how the shoal’s swarm intelligence is pitched against that of the clever sea lions. It also discovers some extraordinary new behaviour as the sea lion gift some of their catch to the marlin. On a Caribbean beach, another spy meets the crab world’s most entertaining characters – hermit crabs. They may be comical in nature, but they also have highly developed organisational skills. When they’ve outgrown their shells, they line up in order of size to exchange them for a better fit. All is going well until Spy Hermit Crab loses its shell to a crab looking to upsize its accommodation. The crab becomes the unwitting camera operator as it captures a crab’s-eye view of the organised chaos. On another Caribbean island, a colony of wild pigs embrace beach life by taking a daily dip in the sea. Spy Pig joins their daily ritual as they forage for food brought in by visiting boats. As their ingenuity draws the crowds, Spy Pig gets caught up in the resulting feeding frenzy. Back on the reefs, Spy Coconut Octopus donates its shell to a family of enterprising clownfish. In an astonishing show of teamwork, the fish work together to move the shell back to their anemone home, creating a safe place to lay their eggs among the poisonous tentacles. In this action-packed first episode, our spies discover sea creatures with many mind-boggling ways of thinking, but none match those with the biggest brains of all – sperm whales. In more astonishing scenes, Spy Sperm Whale witnesses a rare and beautiful gathering as whale families from far and wide huddle together and exchange information – an extraordinary display of social intelligence, uncannily similar to our own.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: David Attenborough narrates a natural history of the oceans. This edition explores a force so powerful that it moves oceans - the tides. All over the world tides create opportunities for marine life: giant sting rays glide on currents for a rest, the fastest snail of all surfs waves in pursuit of dinner, minute crabs play football on the beach, racoons binge and, in a unique sequence, dolphins play a deadly game of catch. For in the ocean, each turn of the tide spells life or death, somewhere.

programme.title: Life Below Zero

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben makes an unprecedented third visit to see his old friends Bill and Bob, elderly twins living in the canyons of Utah, and realises that their paranoia about the outside world has grown.

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins
programme.desc: Sue Perkins starts her journey in Tokyo, home to 36 million people. She trains with a female sumo wrestling team and meets a family who live with robots.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey shed light on how some of Britains biggest factories make the nations favourite products, beginning with popular breakfast cereals. Gregg starts by receiving a boat-load of corn fresh from Argentina, and witnesses as it is cooked, milled and flavoured to become a top-selling cereal brand. Cherry learns about the immunity-boosting powers of vitamin D, which is added to many of the UKs most popular cereals, and historian Ruth Gordon samples a Victorian breakfast of lobster and pigs head, as part of a daily meal that included 4,500 calories

programme.title: Mummies Unwrapped
programme.desc: Experts around the world utilise modern technologies and criminologists techniques to unveil new facts that led to the deaths of some of Ancient Egypts most important royals.

programme.title: Changing Planet

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Sue repurposes a snow melter. Ricko repairs his cabin. Jessie builds a new dock. The Hailstones go beachcombing.

programme.desc: Ben Fogle revisits Rauri on Rathlin Island, who left HR for off-grid life. They repaint Rauris house and discuss his health struggles, and a daring journey he made to help those in need.

programme.title: Solar System

programme.title: Simon Reeves South America
programme.desc: On the fourth leg of his journey through the continent, Simon travels through three of the worlds most extreme environments as he takes in the salt flats of Bolivia, Brazils Pantanal wetland region and Paraguays Chaco Forest. In Bolivia, he meets a family making a living carving salt from the vast white expanse of the Uyuni flats, while in Brazil he has a close encounter with South Americas apex predator, the jaguar. In Paraguay, Simon visits a Mennonites school, where traditionally clothed children are drilled in Bible texts and there are no smartphones to be seen

programme.title: Murha paratiisissa
programme.desc: Kausi 1, 2/8. Rikoskomisario Richard Poole Lontoon poliisista on saanut siirron Karibian paratiisisaarelle, mutta han ei pida sita paratiisina. Myos yhteistyo ylikonstaapeli Camille Bordeyn kanssa takkuaa. Pian kaksikko paasee tositoimiin: He nakevat, kun morsian putoaa hotellin parvekkeelta haapaivanaan. Hetimiten kay selvaksi, etta kyseessa on murha. Brittilais-ranskalainen kuvitteelliselle Karibian saarelle sijoittuva komediallinen rikossarja.

programme.title: Murha paratiisissa

programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe is unsurprised to discover that he is worshipped by a group of moles. To Mom it could mean financial freedom, to Gumball it could mean superpowers; to whoever it’s actually for, it means they’re not getting their package.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Gumball is given a cursed videogame console Elmore becomes trapped inside a fantasy RPG world. Gumball Darwin and Anais have to battle their way through town unraveling the secrets of their new virtual reality. But theyll have to level up if theyre going to stand any chance against the mysterious final boss.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

But when Darwin finally gets his wheels rolling, he realises there might be one important aspect of skating that Gumball hasnt taught him...

programme.title: Totally Spies!
programme.desc: When a toaster attacks Mandy, the Spies must figure out why digital appliances are going rogue. But when WOOHP tech turns against them, the spies discover with Tobys help that going "vintage" is pretty cool and the answer to bringing down the villain.

programme.title: The Heroic Quest of the Valiant Prince Ivandoe
programme.desc: An arrogant little frogman needs the help of Prince Ivandoe to lift his curse and become the big, beautiful bullfrog he once was. Due to a technical error, Prince Ivandoe’s arms have been magically replaced by slimy froggy ones. So he has no choice but to help lift the curse in order to restore his princely arms. The Frogman’s hopeless attempts to find a True Love’s kiss end in failure. So Ivandoe and Bert convince him that his only hope is to earn the forgiveness of The Batwitch - his ex-girlfriend - who was responsible for cursing him in the first place.

programme.title: The Heroic Quest of the Valiant Prince Ivandoe
programme.desc: When Prince Ivandoe triumphantly find the One True Acorn, during a rigged royal contest, he also finds himself betrothed to the psychotic Princess Sprinklejoy of the Red Squirrel Kingdom. Whilst narrowly managing to avoid a royal wedding, both Ivandoe And Bert end up in the Pit of Ow instead…which, all things considered, is actually preferable.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin decide they will rent a movie from the video rental store to watch with their baby sister Anais, but when they are on their way back home with the movie, they are met with many distractions trying to get them off course.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Carmen en Alan maken iedereen gek met hun verliefderigheid. Door zijn opmerkingen drijft Gumball het gelukkige paar uit elkaar. Tot groot plezier van Masami.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole befriends a sympathetic AI, but as their bond grows, it tries to isolate her from the rest of the Wattersons. / Anais’s science project creates a genius version of Richard’s gut, forcing her to choose between it and her real dad.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole befriends a sympathetic AI, but as their bond grows, it tries to isolate her from the rest of the Wattersons. / Anais’s science project creates a genius version of Richard’s gut, forcing her to choose between it and her real dad.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Penny must stay together through the end of the school day to prove that they are meant to be together, despite an astrological prediction Mr. Small has made.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Penny must stay together through the end of the school day to prove that they are meant to be together, despite an astrological prediction Mr. Small has made.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean spots a rare book - the Teddy Bear Haunting - in a bookshop, but it’s too expensive to buy. He secretly tries to read it in the shop… until he’s thrown out. To his dismay someone else then buys the book – so he follows the buyer around trying to read over his shoulder. Will Mr Bean manage to get to the end of the book before getting spotted?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are enjoying a day at the arcade, when Mr Bean gets carried away with the dance machine, knocking Teddy onto the floor. Teddy’s picked up, put on a trolley of stuffed toys and figurines – and soon enough, he’s been put in the claw machine as a prize! Mr Bean has run out of coins, so has to find a way of winning Teddy back without looking like he’s cheating!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are looking forward to seeing a once-in-a-lifetime comet – but it won’t appear until 4am! He tries to stay up, but it’s useless – he keeps dropping off. So instead, Mr Bean decides to go to bed and set an alarm – yet he over-winds the clock and it breaks! With all the shops closed, his only option is to build his own complicated version to make sure he doesn’t miss the comet…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctor’s outfit with stethoscope – great Teddy - I’ll give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking he’s a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before he’s found out?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep and Mush-Mush sometimes don’t listen to Lilit. So when she tries to tell them about her great idea to have a special firefly night, they instead believe it is their idea. Grrr! Whose special firefly night will come out on top?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Bolly hurts his foot and can’t go fast until it heals. Phooey! But when everyone gives him treats to cheer him up, Bolly decides he never wants his foot to heal.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is over-joyed when his weevil friend, Chase, returns to Mushton. But Chase seems to have changed, hes way harder to handle now. And he wants something from Chep! But what?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has to give the Mushlets a talk about spiders. But talking in front of a group makes Chep nervous. Mush-Mush offers to do it instead. Problem is Mush-Mush’s knowledge of spiders is so bad he ends up getting caught by one!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers want Amanita to join in telling monster stories. But Amanita doesnt believe in monsters. So they take her on a monster hunt and find more than they imagined.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep wants to be brave enough to join in the daring games that Mush-Mush and Lilit like to play. So he gets some protective moss pants that make him not only indestructible but also fashionable… and a bit cocky. Woo, it’s the new Chep!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast testing every app on the rangers tablet one by one. Grizzy, who is starving, sees that the cupboards are bare. When he realizes that one GPS app can give the itinerary to the nearest chocolate spread store, Grizzy requisitions the tablet.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. Grizzy wants to redecorate the cabin with figurines bearing his effigy, but first he needs to get rid of the Lemmings. Without getting them mixed up with their perfect resin replicas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side, there is the same cabin, only it doesnt belong to a ranger. Its a chocolate spread museum, where the curators are... another Grizzy and other Lemmings, all with very different personalities.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch their favorite program. While looking for a backup zapper, they happen onto a top secret Canadian Army prototype that enables you to apply the usual controls: "play," "pause" and "fast forward" to living beings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road they can create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to stop the Lemmings from playing their extreme trampoline game, Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. Seeing that she wants more, Grizzy decides to become a champ in the sport. But for that to happen, the Lemmings will need to let him work out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. To recover the supply of cookies, which were to be his afternoon snack, Grizzy has no qualms about making the Lemmings sled skid out of control. When the sled hits a superheros spacecraft, a mysterious costume falls out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up… a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play with poseable figurines of wild Canadian animals. When Grizzy sees that the bear figurine has been put inside a little cage, whereas those of the Lemmings are gathered around a mini-jar of chocolate spread, he decides to join in the party and take control of his own figurine.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a new generation Tamagotchi game on the Rangers tablet: the camera scans the player and gives him a virtual avatar of himself to take care of.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some. However, instead of parking near the grocery store because of the traffic warden, he parks his car at a nearby school where he is mistaken by the principal as the new teacher and is forced to teach a group of juvenile delinquents. But he actually may be a better teacher than he thought.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Bean’s resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. It’s a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Bean’s house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But it’s not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are ecstatic: Muddlers fear of spiders rid the forest of him! But they soon learn that even Muddler is essential to the health of the forest.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit looks up to Chanterelle as an awesome role model. She would so love to be like her one day. But when she starts imitating Chanterelle it doesn’t go to plan.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has a bad feeling. There is something he knows he should remember but can’t. When he finally pieces his memories together, he gets what his bad feeling was about – Mushton is about to be attacked by a plague of hungry woodworms! Prepare the defences!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and friends "favourite play tree" the Fun Tree - is rotten and doomed. But Mush-Mush refuses to give up on it. In a last ditch effort to save the tree, our friends adventure off to try and track down the legendary Starmush, hoping his mysterious healing powers can save it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Short on food supplies, Grizzy has gone out to gather fruit. He comes back with a basketful but discovers that the Lemmings have stolen the last of the chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take off with the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread. Grizzy catches up with them but they drop the jar and it lands in a nearby sacred temple. Grizzy and the Lemmings must solve riddles along the path to the Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize wrestling combats on the living room couch. Grizzy, weary of the clamor, stops the match. The displeased Lemmings retaliate, but during their fight the cabins wood floor caves in and they all fall into an old sidecar!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a spat over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings find gold leaf-wrapped chocolate bits scattered in the jungle. Delicious! On the backs of a bat and a tapir, the rodents and the bear fight over the harvest of candy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Night has fallen, and the solar panels do not generate enough electricity to charge Grizzys TV. He sees the Lemmings playing with fireflies that could make his panels work and tries to distract the Lemmings and capture the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After stealing Grizzys jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the Lemmings propel the bear far from the log cabin. Grizzy lands in a temple where he finds a crystal skull which gives you the power to sow discord within a group. Grizzy uses it to set the rodents at odds amongst themselves and takes advantage of the general fight to recover the chocolate spread. But the effects of the magic skull only last a certain time and the ill-feelings cease. The Lemmings unite to give Grizzy a taste of his own medicine!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While climbing back to the cabin carrying a load of delicious berries, Grizzy trips and falls over backwards. He performs a series of acrobatics worthy of a diving champ and resurfaces safe and sound despite himself. The Lemmings, who saw everything, are in awe and treat Grizzy like an idol. Grizzy starts to enjoy this VIP treatment until the Lemmings ask him to repeat his exploit. Grizzy agrees but discovers that the Lemmings have built a giant diving board for the occasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Determined to recover their favorite afternoon snack, they confront one another in the maze, but end up getting totally lost. Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Things start to disappear from the log cabin as if by magic. Grizzy is persuaded that the Lemmings are the culprits, but the Lemmings are also victims of inexplicable thefts. As they argue, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the true authors of the repeated thefts: a gang of fanatic partridges who bring stolen objects as offerings to their goddess, a giant partridge. Grizzy and Lemmings join forces to infiltrate the nest and recover their belongings.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists he’s an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy – the winner being the first to climb “The Big One”, a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadn’t counted on the competitive dad’s dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how it’s done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwal’s precious plant once a day while he’s on holiday. It’s all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbour’s gadgets while he’s away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night – but Mr Bean’s other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwal’s got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid won’t shut as it’s too full of rubbish – and by the time he’s shut it, they’ve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they won’t notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean… who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drops Irma off at the airport – she and Lottie are going on a lovely sunny holiday without them. To cheer Teddy up, Mr Bean has a brainwave - don’t worry, we’ll have a holiday right here at home! So Mr Bean goes about recreating all the things he saw in Irma’s brochure – a flight on an Bean Airways and a stay at Hotel Bean with sea view and a pool! Hope Irma is having a great time too…

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jelly cake, Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons and the rodents discover a passageway leading to a secret elfin room.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. The sly bear gets rid of the rodents by enticing their mounts away with food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pursues the Lemmings throughout the castle to recover the jelly cake they stole from him. In an impasse, the bear runs smack into a ghost.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a giant jelly cake. Their chase leads them to the castle library, where the Lemmings accidentally activate the opening of a secret passage.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: In the season two premiere episode, the gang force an over-worked Fred (FRANK WELKER) to relax and take some time off from mystery solving.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang rushes Scooby to an animal hospital when he suddenly falls ill. But things go from bad to worse when they discover the Gothic, old hospital is also home to a rampaging werewolf!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Harley Quinn’s Hyena goes missing, Bibi agrees to help Jestah look for her. / A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom. It’s up to MOE to stop the Zoomers with zany improvised tricks and traps with a little help from Ace and Batcomputer.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Baby Bop keeps having meltdowns during a game with the kids, making it hard for everyone to play together. Barney steps in to figure out what is causing Baby Bops upsets and helps her manage them so everyone can continue to have fun.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Grady fills a big crack in the parks entryway with concrete so no one trips. Vivie comes up with the idea to add found items, creating a beautiful art piece, and discovers that even though shes small she can have a big effect on the park.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: There’s easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration – and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one that’s perfect but is outraged when he’s told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers he’s one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find it’s closed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his ‘princess’. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their ‘relaxing’ holiday!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput into the darkest jungle, where they have a go at the literal oldest trick in the book: a covered pit trap. Why these guys think this will work is anyone’s guess.Edit m

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are in the mountains, doing mountainy things. They look through their binoculars and see Lamput in the distance, doing his own mountainy things. GET HIM! After a dramatic chase across the mountain range, Lamput escapes into a cave and the Docs pursue, but its no ordinary cave. Its the home of a very grumpy dragon who loves his beauty sleep! The Docs are captured and Lamput has to come to the rescue to save the day. Luckily for him, his new forest buddies and his specular musical skills might just help in coming up with a solution.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput to a haunted mansion populated by ghosts, monsters and all things spooky. Lamput makes quick friends with a ghost prince who happens to be the lord of the mansion, but the Docs run into much less friendlier characters.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast racing down the ice slope in competition with the stuffed Bear-Ranger and manage to win each time. Grizzy cannot stand seeing his avatar humiliated and he decides to enter the competition to help him. Their frenzied descent gets out of hand and everyone is propelled all the way to the hangar of the research station, where they discover an ultra-sophisticated racing game. The racecourse sprawls over the entire icefield via drones that project holographic elements. Grizzy and the Lemmings get into super-fast snowmobiles and launch into the race of the century.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

The Lemmings, who consider it was their recipe, swap the chocolate granita with another one made in an old flowerpot with potting soil. The choco-granito race is off and running!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are starving for their reserves are depleted and their fishing has been unsuccessful. Fortunately, a truck delivers a crate of edibles to the research station that contains compact food cubes. When placed under a special light beam, the cubes retransform into delicious meals. Grizzy discovers that the decompressing lamp can, conversely, compact organic elements too. For example, the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings pace around the log cabin searching for virtual animals to capture with their tablet game. Annoyed by their behavior, Grizzy throws them outside. Determined to continue playing, the Lemmings trick the bear. But when the tablet hits the circuit breaker and explodes, the gaming animals come to life! Ice dinosaurs, laser caribous and giant carnivorous plants. The life-size hunt can begin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A snowstorm rips the solar panels off the log cabin and Grizzy can no longer watch TV or enjoy the comforts of home! But he has a brilliant idea. He produces electricity by making a caribou run on a treadmill, using the last carrot in the house as bait. But the Lemmings absolutely want his carrot to make the perfect snowman.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers in shock that the TV has been replaced with a trompe-l’oeil image. But will they be able to control the spirit?

programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert.

programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Eating too many sweets gives Bean a terrible toothache, and when all other attempts at curing it are exhausted, he reluctantly visits the dreaded dentist.

Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super fun app that allows you to see yourself as a rabbit or a robot or else decked out with lots of animated accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When they find a book on Japanese origami, the Lemmings churn out paper birds to play gliding games. Grizzy realizes that he could make the butterfly on the cover for his beloved she-bear.
