There is only one real drawback: the speedometer function which the Lemmings adore.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings clamor for their turn to play with the rangers mobile phone, but Grizzy isnt in the sharing mood. And hes very talented at flattening anything that comes near, without looking up from his game. The Lemmings invent an implacable protection system which should enable them to recover the mobile in complete safety.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. To get rid of the Lemmings, who have sights on his jar of Yummy, Grizzy hides the jar and pretends he has an invisible one. When the Lemmings see through the trick, they decide to trap Grizzy with a grand illusion number.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When the old Rooster Beetle comes to the end of his crowing days, everyone worries for Mush-Mush. ‘Rooster’ is Mush-Mush’s favourite. But Mush-Mush insists he is fine when everyoneknows he is not. So Mushpot and Starmush help him understand that it’s okay to show hisfeelings.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Fung and Miff spoil Mush-Mushs fun tunnel surprise he has been working on for ages, he wishes their day was ruined too. And then it is, because they are taken by Muddler! Now our Mushlers have to go on a rescue mission to save Fung and Miff.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When an egg blows down into the village, it is Mush-Mush and friends mission to return it to Mush Mountain. Two problems though: there is a Beetle Boom on and all the beetles try to charge and knock over Mushables, and Lilit has always wanted to see an egg hatch so secretly drags her feet...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is disappointed Mush-Mush and Lilit are too busy leaf-gliding to play moss-ball with him, so he hangs out with a new weevil friend instead. But Cheps new friend must migrate with all the other weevils -Except he doesnt know how to fly! Chep must teach him to fly while overcoming his own secret fear of heights.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A frog swallows an ancestral jewel that bestows it with the power of mind control. Grizzy uses the frog to swallow the flies that have proliferated in the cabin, and which now let themselves be docilely caught. The Lemmings don’t miss a thing. They decide to get hold of the frog to hypnotize an uncooperative tapir who refuses to play rodeo. Grizzy hypnotizes the Lemmings, who become his servants. But several Lemmings escaped and are preparing a rescue mission.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A military convoy has an accident while transporting top-secret material. In the impact, a technological sphere flies out and rolls over to Grizzy, who was gathering berries in the forest. Grizzy realizes that the sphere is a sort of compass that indicates the direction of his desires. He follows it and finds a bush overflowing with his favorite berries. The Lemmings recover the compass to find super game sites in the forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a hand-shaped scepter ornated with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches with gold. Grizzy uses the object to “gold leaf” the Lemmings and swipe their chocolate bar. The Lemmings use their golden casts as armors to recover their chocolate. During the combat, the gold nugget is replaced by a chocolate one: the scepter now coats everything with chocolate. The Lemmings snatch it and flee.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a dance contest where the first prize is a jar of chocolate spread. Grizzy is hungry and decides to participate. He partners up with a talented dancing parrot and wins. Incapable of sharing, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the prize. The parrot brings the jar to a temple devoted to the glory of dancing parrots. To get it back, Grizzy and the Lemmings must perform a choreography. They decide to rehearse together.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange creature fossilized in amber resin that resembles him. A natural science encyclopedia confirms that it’s his ancestor. Grizzy wants to take the block of amber, but the Lemmings fight him for it because the blue animal with big teeth is their ancestor too. The block cracks during their fight and frees the ancestor who turns out to be a rather unmanageable burden.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a strange card game representing the elements along with instructions. The idea is to pretend that the ground is on fire or of ice, like in the game “Floor is Lava.” They transform the cabin into a giant adventure trail. Depending on the card drawn, they must avoid zones on the floor with flames or wax. Grizzy unceremoniously gets rids of the setup to regain control of the cabin. One of the cards lands on a stone slab that transforms into lava. The Lemmings are delighted: they will be able to play “for real”!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a very particular cocoa tree with chocolate-spread sap! Reduced to eating canned Brussels sprouts, the only remaining food in the cabin, Grizzy is baffled when he sees the Lemmings parading past to equip themselves with all sorts of containers: ladles, soup spoons, bowls, buckets, basins, etc. He watches them through binoculars and discovers that they have planted a faucet in a tree where chocolate spread flows. Grizzy decides to siphon off their tree.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy expels the Lemmings from the cabin where they had built a cumbersome obstacle course. Peaceful at last and feeling lazy, he is determined not to leave his couch. The Lemmings discover a magic Mayan disc that allows you to choose instantaneous mutations of other animals’ features: bat wings, reindeer antlers, elephant trunks, etc. The mutant Lemmings return to the cabin, determined to continue playing their game while enjoying their new accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As they fight over the last jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings accidentally send it flying deep into the jungle. They both set out in search for the jar, but in a forest that dense, it’s an impossible mission. In a Mayan Temple, the Lemmings discover a magic bracelet that increases one’s sense of smell tenfold and use it to find the jar. Grizzy loses their trail, but finds some Mayan bracelets himself: one for eyesight and one for hearing. Enough to infallibly track down the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy is about to go to bed, he ousts the Lemmings who are holding a surprise party in the cabin. The Lemmings land in a Mayan Temple devoted to the moon. While toying with an ancestral console, the Lemmings set off a cosmic phenomenon that brings the moon, which is now the size of a disco ball, to the temple. In its aura, gravity becomes very weak. Enough to get rid of Grizzy and have a very original fiesta.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: At a funfair, Mr Bean wins a balloon for Teddy and ties it to him while he plays on the hook a duck. But he’s so engrossed he doesn’t notice his companion floating away! Soon Mr Bean is chasing Teddy as he glides and snags on various fairground rides. Will Mr Bean rescue Teddy before he floats away forever?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock – Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys an expensive dress for Irma which he plans to return - so has to protect it from damage. / Mr Bean goes to buy the biggest TV in the world only to find that it has a price- tag to match.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece –featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wicket’s pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbour’s house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him. Displeased, the rodents replace Grizzys green frogs with poisonous orange ones that paralyze anyone who touches them!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize an obstacle course in their cabin. Grizzy ejects the Lemmings from the cabin and they crash onto an Incan temple where they discover a spheric object that can control the Earths rotation.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get hold of an old pinball machine and install it in the cabin. Their furious party interrupts Grizzys nap and the bear threatens to break the contraption.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy, a big chocolate lover, is growing a young cacao tree under an ultraviolet lamp. During a trampoline session, the Lemmings accidentally break the lamp, provoking a supernatural reaction.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang heads to a Renaissance Faire where they must stop an evil court jester from ending the kings reign…permanently!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When the ghost of a small towns founder returns to scare off mayoral candidates, the gang decides to run Velma as mayor to bait the ghost. They quickly discover however, that Velma lacks the skill set to make her a popular politician.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi and Batwing must work together to get past the Legion of Zoom in order to deliver a new giant screen to Batcomputer.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: The Batwheels take on a new vehicular villain who keeps growing bigger and bigger, while learning that size doesnt always win the day.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Vivie is disappointed that the parks Splash Pad is closed. Barney creates a trip to the Castleverse, and Mel is confused when Vivie isnt having fun doing all the things Mel is doing. Mel realizes that its okay to have different interests.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: At lunch in the park, Mels friends are unwilling to try a taste of her kimchi. Barney whips up a beach day with Baby Bop, where she doesnt want to do anything new. The kids realize the value of trying new things to show others you care.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A street mime artist takes a shine to Mr. Bean when the pair meet in the local park. Because Mr. Bean fails to pay him, the mime follows Mr. Bean to his apartment when hes not looking and breaks Mrs. Wickets water statue. But eventually, Mr. Bean manages to out-mime him!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chaotic cartoon capers following the further adventures of the popular halfwit immortalised in the live-action TV series and Hollywood films. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero ‘Super Spy’ and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers’ house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes scoutmaster for the day, but his obsession with badge collecting does not help him make friends.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny is being kept awake by a bad case of the hiccups. Half asleep, he guzzles down a midnight drink. Turns out Specs has forgotten sharehouse rule number one: DONT KEEP EXPERIMENTAL LAB CONCOCTIONS IN THE KITCHEN FRIDGE. Skinnys hiccups dont get better. Unless you count "literally turning into a monster every time you hiccup" as "better". No point sitting around shedding on the furniture: Specs puts his newly monsterific buddy to good use as a Lamput-hunter. Which goes well until Skinny gets better. If you count being chased off into the distance by an angry bear as "better".

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput is hiding in a school, and the only way for the Docs to get him is to anti-age zap themselves back into childhood. (obviously)After stalking him in the corridors and unsuccessfully evading detention slips from the Headteacher, they find themselves in class. Skinny is rather happy to be back, but Specs doesnt like tests or art or chemistry or anything that distracts him from his true objective. Each time they almost get him, Lamput is saved by the bell (and even becomes the bell), and its a race against home time to see if they can get Lamput before the Headteacher gets them.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After repeated failures, the Docs finally realized what they were lacking: a good moustache! With their powerful facial hair, they are now unstoppable!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Not easy to enjoy a DVD about salmon when the Lemmings are having a disco party right there. Grizzy sends them packing with such force that they land at the research station, where they discover a state-of-the-art U.V. cabin. When turned up to the max, the light therapy and music options can advantageously replace the disco equipment Grizzy destroyed. The noise they make causes a block of ice to break off. It hurdles down the slope to the cabin and destroys Grizzy’s TV. But it doesn’t take the bear long to figure out that the U.V. cabin also has a DVD function.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun destroying ice towers. When Grizzy sees them, it inspires him to sculpt statues of himself. The Lemmings cannot resist the temptation to destroy the statues of Grizzy, who does everything in his power to protect them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A container adrift along the icefield will change the lives of Grizzy and the Lemmings: it’s an inexhaustible stock of chocolate spread! There is so much, that for the first time the close enemies have no need to fight over the treat. They entice a flock of penguins into hoisting the container out of the water. One of the penguins, who did not get his reward in fish, is disgruntled. Grizzy has him taste the Yummy, then throws the jar far away to get rid of the penguin. The chocolate treat spreads over the icefield. Fatal error?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses a fire extinguisher to chase the Lemmings from the living room so that he can take a nap, but the gadget accidentally flies out the window. It lands at the top of an ice cliff, causing a fissure, and the peak of the cliff topples. Amid the debris, the Lemmings discover a fearsome creature: the Yeti, who is looking for the guilty party. The Lemmings bring him to Grizzy, never dreaming that the giant will immediately fall in love with the Ranger’s cabin and throw a very original party.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are bored. A coconut rolls over to Grizzy’s feet, pulling the bear out of his state of torpor. He imagines a sort of face on the nut and decides to care for it, like a child with its doll. He has so much fun playing with his new toy that the Lemmings want to join in. But when the bear refuses, the Lemmings ruse: they hide inside other coconuts in hopes of being adopted by Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While bickering with the Lemmings over control of the TV, Grizzy sees an illustration that gives him an idea. In a medical book, a person whose leg is in a cast is being served dinner in front of a TV. Grizzy pretends to have a twisted ankle and shows the Lemmings the patient care illustrations. The imaginary invalid Grizzy is so convincing that the Lemmings fall for the trick. They think that the sooner Grizzy is healed, the sooner they will be able to throw him out of the cabin as planned.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A battle for control erupts after a genie emerges from a lamp that Ginger brought home from a yard sale.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Cat and Mouse detectives are hired to track down Tuffys imaginary scapegoat, Mr. Nobody.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its the battle of the soldier angels when pranks run amok on April Fools Day.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom has trouble keeping track of a pinata full of stolen loot.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A knock on the head turns Tom into Quixote that leads him into battle with Butch over Toodles affections.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone assumes that Harley Quinn is the culprit in a recent burglary. But as Batman and Bam pursue Harley, Bibi and Redbird begin to suspect that she may actually be innocent.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against the Riddler.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Om het mysterie op te lossen rondom een spookachtige artiest die ronddwaalt in haar voormalige concerthal, moet de gang doen alsof ze een rockband zijn! Maar kunnen ze de zaak oplossen voor dat Velma het podium op moet en moet zingen?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred is excited to visit The Vault - a high security prison from which no convict has ever escaped. But when the ghost of Stealing Stan (JOHN DiMAGGIO), an inmate who always claimed to be innocent, terrorizes the prison, Fred has to solve the mystery and rethink his stance on criminal justice!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesn’t have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises it’s a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesn’t go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesn’t have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he can’t remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine there’s only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Bean’s main concern is to get some money and get back to the baker’s before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own ‘No Littering’ signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentine’s Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irma’s attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a ‘date’ to the Valentine’s Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-teller’s prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take off with the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread. Grizzy catches up with them but they drop the jar and it lands in a nearby sacred temple. Grizzy and the Lemmings must solve riddles along the path to the Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize wrestling combats on the living room couch. Grizzy, weary of the clamor, stops the match. The displeased Lemmings retaliate, but during their fight the cabins wood floor caves in and they all fall into an old sidecar!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a spat over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings find gold leaf-wrapped chocolate bits scattered in the jungle. Delicious! On the backs of a bat and a tapir, the rodents and the bear fight over the harvest of candy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Night has fallen, and the solar panels do not generate enough electricity to charge Grizzys TV. He sees the Lemmings playing with fireflies that could make his panels work and tries to distract the Lemmings and capture the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After stealing Grizzys jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the Lemmings propel the bear far from the log cabin. Grizzy lands in a temple where he finds a crystal skull which gives you the power to sow discord within a group. Grizzy uses it to set the rodents at odds amongst themselves and takes advantage of the general fight to recover the chocolate spread. But the effects of the magic skull only last a certain time and the ill-feelings cease. The Lemmings unite to give Grizzy a taste of his own medicine!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While climbing back to the cabin carrying a load of delicious berries, Grizzy trips and falls over backwards. He performs a series of acrobatics worthy of a diving champ and resurfaces safe and sound despite himself. The Lemmings, who saw everything, are in awe and treat Grizzy like an idol. Grizzy starts to enjoy this VIP treatment until the Lemmings ask him to repeat his exploit. Grizzy agrees but discovers that the Lemmings have built a giant diving board for the occasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Determined to recover their favorite afternoon snack, they confront one another in the maze, but end up getting totally lost. Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Things start to disappear from the log cabin as if by magic. Grizzy is persuaded that the Lemmings are the culprits, but the Lemmings are also victims of inexplicable thefts. As they argue, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the true authors of the repeated thefts: a gang of fanatic partridges who bring stolen objects as offerings to their goddess, a giant partridge. Grizzy and Lemmings join forces to infiltrate the nest and recover their belongings.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When a gorgeous feline walks into the Cat and Mouse Detective Agency, Tom is immediately smitten. But someone has already stolen her heart—a heart-shaped cake made for a gangster and his fiancee on their upcoming engagement. He asked for the expensive engagement ring to be baked into the batter as a Valentines Day surprise, but the cake and the jewelry were stolen from the bakery window.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Inside the house, Tom and Jerry get into a full-on brawl. Steam comes out of their ears as they face off. Just then, Ginger and Rick walk in, grab both by the scruff of their necks, and says they have to learn to deal with their anger. Ginger shoves a copy of an anger management book at them. Spike and Tom both roll their eyes but agree to make an effort.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Old Snelgrove, the senior butler, is retiring. There is an open backyard Olympics on the estate to see who will replace him. When the contestants in the field are narrowed down to Butch and Tom, what will the final outcome be?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Red Herring complains to Tom and Jerry that he keeps hearing laughter everywhere he goes. Tom and Jerry bodyguard Red to prevent him from doing anything that might provoke laughter, but Reds goof-ups and fails soon have even them convulsed. Gradually, it gets loud enough that Tom and Jerry can hear it too. Will they find the true source of the laughter?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry awake to the smell of eggs being cooked in the kitchen – Ginger and Rick are making breakfast courtesy of their neighbors fresh eggs. Ginger and Rick talk about how their new neighbor has a suburban henhouse and is raising their own produce. Tom and Jerry team up to target the henhouse for a heist, but its easier said than done.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A little baby goat butts his head through a distant wall of the estate and starts nibbling the grass. At first, he helps Tom with the yardwork but then causes chaos throughout the manor. Tom and Jerry are left to deal with the kid.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: On another scary night in the castle, The Invisible Cat wants nothing more than to catch mice. After it picks up and carries Jerry and Tuffy, Tom is really confused (and spooked) to see the two mice "magically" float through the air! When Tom accidentally smacks The Invisible Cat in the face and knocks Jerry and Tuffy free of his hold, it sparks a slapstick fight between the two cats.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: As Rick and Ginger prepare for a costume party, Tom tries to score some snacks. Jerry and Tuffy are out to do the same. Spike and Tom are initially confused by the guests costumes. Determined to get their paws on as much party food as they can, however, they contrive their own costumes to crash the party. Will they get away with it?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: On the outskirts of Catsylvania, zombie cats pop up out of the ground as Tom passes a cemetery, so Tom runs to Jerry Van Mouseling for help. At first, the mouse thinks Tom is a zombie cat or Frankenstein-cat and tries repelling him. However, once Jerry understands the problem, he and his band of angry peasant mice help fight the zombie cats.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all round…but then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by… his hair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr Bean goes to watch his favorite TV show, he hears loud noises from the neighbors. He moves to the garden but he cannot escape the cacophony of trumpet drilling and crying babies. Bean starts thinking about revenge...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctor’s outfit with stethoscope – great Teddy - I’ll give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking he’s a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before he’s found out?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride – but the security guard makes it clear it’s for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, it’s not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has a terrible no-good day after she keeps messing up and lets Joker get away. She doesn’t think he can help Batgirl anymore, but a “bad today” doesn’t mean it’ll be a “bad tomorrow".

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputer’s motherboard. / When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave. / Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show. / Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of "Bat-Ball".

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies, the Batwheels have to quickly learn to “drive a mile in each other’s wheels” in time to stop the approaching Legion of Zoom!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwing’s motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that they’re better when they work together. / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry has his eyes set on Tom’s catch of the day and is determined to stand in the way. Tom is also bent on getting a taste of the sea one way or the other! Will they sink or swim?

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Vivie is disappointed that the parks Splash Pad is closed. Barney creates a trip to the Castleverse, and Mel is confused when Vivie isnt having fun doing all the things Mel is doing. Mel realizes that its okay to have different interests.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Mel is frustrated that her arm isnt as strong as it used to be after she gets her cast off, so Barney whips up an adventure in the enchanted forest that helps her realize that its okay for some things to take time.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers that the frenzied "break dance" the Lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. When Grizzy catches them too, its panic all round! Grizzy is determined to eliminate the parasites, down to the very last one. The problem is his little roommates have no desire whatsoever to be treated...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Another heat wave: even the riverbed is dried up. One very thirsty Grizzy discovers that the Lemmings have used the last remaining bottles of water to fill their inflatable pool. He has no intention of letting the Lemmings swim in what might very well be his last chance to quench his thirst.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have caught a little spider. Her sticky threads are perfect for bungee jumping. Grizzy, who has no intention of getting caught in the web, decides to crush the insect.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over chocolate-spread jar lids, which they use as chips in a competition to win goodies. Indeed, next to the supermarket are two jackpot-style machines with slots the size of the lids. But more importantly, theres a key to be won that makes you eligible for the grand prize... the giant jar of Yummy on display under a glass cover.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has prepared himself a TV dinner to eat in front of his favorite series. But his moment of pleasure is abruptly interrupted by unexplained static. Grizzy rapidly discovers that the true "interference" is the Lemmings, who are using the TV antenna as a diving board for their water games.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a rave party. When Grizzy throws their ghetto blaster into the river, he sparks a general power outage. Unless he finds an alternative source of energy, and before the Lemmings do, he can kiss his TV night goodbye!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs at a small sea side town, Lamput meets a lonely sea monster. Lamput attempts to help the sea monster makes friends but all his plans backfires. Now the locals are enraged, and the docs take the opportunity to stir up an angry mob to take down the creature and catch Lamput in the process! Not unless Lamput’s new friend has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs’ latest invention generates identical versions of themselves and create a whole mob of ‘Duplicate’ Specs and Skinnies to catch Lamput! However, the device becomes faulty, and the Duplicates can’t be turned off. Now the Docs are stuck with annoying copies of themselves who are turning their lives upside down!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When Lamput disguises himself as a book and gets returned to the Library, the Docs have to be super quiet in their attempts to get him back. They finally manage to sneak past the Librarian, but all chaos erupts when they open a mysterious book in the restricted area. Lamput and the Docs have to team up to get the new ghostly resident back to where he belongs!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But he’s promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match – only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean panics when a monster appears in his cake mix—but it’s a baby bird that grows into a huge stork, soon taking over his entire home!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans frogspawn has grown into hundreds of little frogs. But, the mayor will come by soon. Bean has to catch the slippery green animals, but thats not that easy.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne brengt de gang mee naar Ierland om het oude kasteel van de Blake-familie te bezoeken. Terwijl de gang onder de indruk raakt van het smaragden eiland, worden ze gedwongen te heroverwegen hoe geweldig de oude mythes en legendes daadwerkelijk zijn door een ontmoeting met een verwoestende reus.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang enters the heart of the American Gothic South in order to help an attractive farmer who Fred wants to impress with his mystery-solving prowess. A horrifying Scarecrow has come to life and attempts to drive everyone off his farm.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Quackers cousin, and penguin named Tux, makes life miserable for Tom and Jerry when he insists on trying to devour the fish in Ricks new aquarium.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A lost little lamb appears at Maudes farm.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A Tom and Jerry take on the Johnny Appleseed story.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is mistakenly placed in a shelter for homeless animals and forced to join the shelters rock-n-roll while Jerry lives the life of Riley back home.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The gang are determined to make Rick and Ginger change their mind about downsizing and moving to the big city by making it impossible to sell the house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A lineage check determines that Spike is descended from British aristocracy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a spat over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings find gold leaf-wrapped chocolate bits scattered in the jungle. Delicious! On the backs of a bat and a tapir, the rodents and the bear fight over the harvest of candy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Night has fallen, and the solar panels do not generate enough electricity to charge Grizzys TV. He sees the Lemmings playing with fireflies that could make his panels work and tries to distract the Lemmings and capture the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After stealing Grizzys jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the Lemmings propel the bear far from the log cabin. Grizzy lands in a temple where he finds a crystal skull which gives you the power to sow discord within a group. Grizzy uses it to set the rodents at odds amongst themselves and takes advantage of the general fight to recover the chocolate spread. But the effects of the magic skull only last a certain time and the ill-feelings cease. The Lemmings unite to give Grizzy a taste of his own medicine!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While climbing back to the cabin carrying a load of delicious berries, Grizzy trips and falls over backwards. He performs a series of acrobatics worthy of a diving champ and resurfaces safe and sound despite himself. The Lemmings, who saw everything, are in awe and treat Grizzy like an idol. Grizzy starts to enjoy this VIP treatment until the Lemmings ask him to repeat his exploit. Grizzy agrees but discovers that the Lemmings have built a giant diving board for the occasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Determined to recover their favorite afternoon snack, they confront one another in the maze, but end up getting totally lost. Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Queen Beatrice hires The Looney Builders to build a workshop in her beehive where there is one rule the crew has trouble following.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bugs, Lola, Daffy, Porky and Tweety utilise their vehicles to tackle construction projects, all the while acquiring valuable insights.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Penelope Pussycat to build a fashion runway in France where they are encouraged to make their design bigger and more fun.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China, but the crew faces a major setback and Bugs worries about letting down his favourite chef.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build a giant claw game for Chibi Critter’s arcade in Japan, they discover the claw part is broken.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as he’s tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show, but when Batman needs their help, they must choose between winning the competition and their responsibilities to fight crime.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. / When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover! / To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Super-genius villain Egghead is on the loose, planning to use Gotham Museums famed giant egg to cook up a record-breaking breakfast.

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: The bugs talk about things that are dear to their hearts.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists he’s an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy – the winner being the first to climb “The Big One”, a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadn’t counted on the competitive dad’s dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how it’s done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwal’s precious plant once a day while he’s on holiday. It’s all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbour’s gadgets while he’s away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night – but Mr Bean’s other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwal’s got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid won’t shut as it’s too full of rubbish – and by the time he’s shut it, they’ve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they won’t notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean… who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drops Irma off at the airport – she and Lottie are going on a lovely sunny holiday without them. To cheer Teddy up, Mr Bean has a brainwave - don’t worry, we’ll have a holiday right here at home! So Mr Bean goes about recreating all the things he saw in Irma’s brochure – a flight on an Bean Airways and a stay at Hotel Bean with sea view and a pool! Hope Irma is having a great time too…

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having learnt that Starmush overcame his fear of the Dark Forest by staying a night there when he was a Mushler, Mush-Mush and Lilit convince Chep that they should do the same. But will they end up fearless or fearful?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers’ home-tree isn’t big enough to store all of Chep’s collections. So Chep goes all around Mushton to find a new home for them – and no way he’s letting them move out without him!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is the champ of finding Mushables in their version of ‘hide-and-seek’ – ‘Hide your Hat’. The last one he needs to find is Mushpot. But Mushpot is the champ of hiding!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: With Sumush out of town, both Mush-Mush and Fung think that they are now the strongest Mushables in Mushton. But neither of them counts on the strength of Lilit and Miff!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is super happy to have Amanita become a collector as well. Until she starts getting better at collecting than he is!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Our Mushlers discover a super-sticky tree sap and use it to have lots of fun… until Mush-Mush gets stuck to Muddler’s back.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings shiver with cold, sneeze and are glassy-eyed: they have a big fat cold! They look so pitiful that Grizzy doesnt have the heart to throw them into the void, even if they are extremely annoying when they try to snuggle up to him to keep warm. He decides to heal them: the quicker they get better, the quicker Grizzy will be able to get rid of them pitilessly.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. Grizzy does not particularly care for this frosty ambiance and tries to take their candy away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe it: he has just swallowed a spoonful of his favorite food, chocolate spread, and he hates it! How could that be possible? And yet, when he swiped the jar from the Lemmings, they seemed to be enjoying it immensely. A quick investigation reveals that the Lemmings added a dash of lemon juice to the jar to give the spread a sharper taste. And they intend to jazz up the rest of the stock as well!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the fondness of his beloved she-bear for meditation. To seduce her he sets out to prove to her that he too can attain the Zen attitude.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super-secret Canadian Army prototype which resembles a simple computer keyboard. It has only several command keys: select, cut and paste, and delete, but the keys act directly on surrounding elements... as well as on living beings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After the rains, to the great delight of the Lemmings, strange bouncing mushrooms have sprouted in the yard. To put an end to the Lemmings noisy games - which prevent Grizzy from enjoying his peace and quiet - Grizzy tramples the mushrooms. Only to realize that each crushed mushroom frees a cloud of spores that instantly creates... a bunch of identical mushrooms.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have laid hand on special magnets which turn any object they are stuck to into flying objects. Grizzy bears the consequences and is ejected out of the cabin on his couch, which has turned into a flying-couch. Upon landing, Grizzy discovers by chance that the magnet stuck to his forehead enables him to fly like Peter Pan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With a lion-tamers whip, a sugar bowl and lots of work, the Lemmings have successfully trained a caribou to go through their obstacle course. Grizzy cannot help but admire the performance. He decides to steal their idea, and the caribou, to create his own circus act and impress his lovely she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto the electronic version of the "Ranger Lemming" toy which is capable of reproducing the movements one teaches it, like a smart robot. Grizzy immediately grasps the potential of a robot that could perform chores with rapidity and precision, but the Lemmings would rather teach it to dance.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: It is a nice sunny day and Mr. Bean and Mrs. Wicket are relaxing in the garden, Mr. Bean attempts to sit beside her in the cool shade of her outdoor umbrella but Mrs. Wicket refuses. He decides to design his own umbrella for himself and Teddy. As he starts digging, he discovers - to his surprise - a bomb. He tries to disarm it, unfortunately, his attempt only accelerates its countdown.

programme.desc: CNBC heads to Baghdad for a conversation with Iraqs Prime Minister, Mohammed Shia Al-Sudani just weeks before his country heads to the polls. Dan Murphy speaks to the PM about Baghdads balancing act, between Iran and the United States and the major oil producers future as crude prices hover around $60 per barrel.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Jason Derek Brown looks like a wealthy mellow surfer dude, but hes allegedly a stone-cold killer who shoots a security guard five times in the head to steal $56,000 in cash. Authorities say Brown robs an armored car guard to fuel his corrupt playboy lifestyle. This serial con artist leads the FBI on a heart-pumping chase over several western states and lands on the FBIs Most Wanted list.

programme.title: Planet A
programme.desc: Many cities around the world dedicate insane amounts of space to parking. programme.desc: The processing of almonds and the production of high-end motorcycles. Fish rubbing and clay shooting machines are also considered. Plus, developments in the techniques used over the years.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Where materials come from and how manufacturing processes have developed over the years, fosusing on candied fruit, linen ukuleles, throttle bottles and limestone mantels.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: Three meters of brass tubing is stretched, bent and brazed to make a trombone. Also, see how the traditional Spanish bota is created and how smelly, muddy peat is turned into rejuvenating face cream.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: Over 35 million people love to surf, so how do they make the perfect board for catching waves? Plus, the world eats 10 million tonnes of butter a year - how do they do it?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: In a highly mechanised world, the host explores how ordinary objects are created and sheds light on the vision of geniuses and industrial designers who strive to make things better.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How do they produce a million tonnes of stainless steel? How do they keep cash safe with an uncrackable lock? How do they make traditional Indian sugar?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: Discover how geoduck, one of the worlds weirdest seafood delicacies, is harvested. Also, see how a head of steam is built up on one of South Africas oldest working trains and how water polo players are protected from injury.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How do they build one of the worlds most exclusive luxury cars? How do they make a referees whistle that can be heard above 50,000 screaming fans? How they make paprika smoky?

programme.title: How the Universe Works

programme.title: How the Universe Works

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: The material used for making common items including moccasins, electronic-impact drills, and the processes involved. Plus, wooden utensils and transport refrigeration units.

programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Kun aiti menee yksinaan kavelylle rannalle, Bluey juoksee hanet kiinni nayttakseen loytamaansa simpukankuorta. Teeskennellessaan merenneitoa, joka viimein sai jalat, han lahtee seikkailulle yksinaan, seuraten aidin jalanjalkia rantaviivaa pitkin. Matkalla han nakee surffaajan, arsyttavia lokkeja, parven rapuja, ikaantyneen meduusan seka ison ja hermostuneen pelikaanin. Saatuaan ensikosketuksen itsenaiseen elamaan, Bluey liittyy taas aidin seuraan ja kuuntelevat simpukankuorta ennen kuin kavelevat takaisin rantaa pitkin.

programme.desc: Loydettyaan salkullisen varastettua rahaa Timon ja Pumba toimivat oikein ja palauttavat ne omistajalleen, Kriminaali-Quintille. programme.title: Suur võidusõit. Lancia Audi vastu
programme.desc: Film 1983. aasta autoralli maailmameistrivõistlustest, mis tegi revolutsiooni autospordis. Suureparane naitlejaansambel aitab vaatajatel tunda sedasama adrenaliinitulva, mida tundsid toona ralli pealtvaatajad. 51. Monte Carlo ralli osutus maailma kõige võistluslikumaks ja ohtlikumaks spordisundmuseks. See oli kahe auahne firma, kahe filosoofia, kahe legendaarse titaani Audi ja Lancia jõuproov, roolis maailma parimad rallisõitjad.

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: „Terevisioonis" on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mõnusad kulalised. programme.title: OP
programme.desc: Iganadalane kultuurikompass! Saatejuht Owe Petersell võtab vaataja kaasa kinno, teatrisse, naitusele, raamatupoodi, kontserdile ja mujalegi. Režissoor Antti Hakli, toimetajad Ave-Marleen Rei ja Ave Lutter.

programme.title: Kultuuri kodu
programme.desc: Kultuuri kodu on koht kõigile Eesti kirjanikele, muusikutele, kunstnikele, arhitektidele, disaineritele, teatri- ja filmiinimestele. See on ruumikas pesapaik, kuhu mahuvad kõik kenasti ara ja head kultuuri pole ju kunagi liiga palju. Eesti Kultuurkapitali sajanda juubeli puhul koputame kultuuri kodu uksele ja vaatame, kes neist meie aega ja ruumi kujundavatest loojatest parajasti kodus juhtub olema. Luhiportreede sarja režissoor on Erle Veber, tekste kirjutab Urmas Vadi ja loeb Marika Vaarik, arhiivis toimetab Ruth Alakula, kaamerat juhib Manuel Magi ning mikrofoni hoiab Mart Kessel-Otsa.

programme.title: Kommentaare Eesti filmile
programme.desc: Priit Parn ja Janno Põldma sissejuhatus oma animafilmile vendade Auguste ja Louis Lumière elust.

Animafilm "1895" on puhendatud filmikunsti 100. aastapaevale. Film vendade August ja Louis Lumiereide elust, mis kasitleb uldsusele seni tundmatuid fakte ning sundmusi kahe kuulsa venna, kes on lainud ajalukku kui kinematograafia leiutajad, elust. Film on illusioon. Kas illusioon on tõde? See vaide ja kusimus olid aluseks autoritele, kui nad võtsid endale õiguse kinnitada, et just nende versioon vendade Lumiereide elust ning filmikunsti sunnist on seni teadaolevatest kõige originaalsem ja ainulaadsem. Rohkete auhindadega parjatud filmi lavastasid Priit Parn ja Janno Põldma.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Mauro otsustab La Promesast lahkuda. Petra uritab Felicianoga suhteid klaarida. Cruzile ei meeldi Manueli tegu sugugi. Catalina tahab Pelayoga reisile minna.

programme.title: Hercule Poirot
programme.desc: Maailmarahu toetuseks korraldatakse rahvusvaheline vastuvõtt, mille tipuks on malematš eaka vene suurmeistriga. Paraku sureb malesuurmeister otse malelaua taga ja ajakirjanduses ilmuvad lood salaparasest Suurest Nelikust. Poirotgi hakkab uurima poliitilisi telgitaguseid, kuid taipab peagi, et mõrvar tegutseb marksa isiklikumatel motiividel.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Reynoldsi juveeliari roovlitest paaseb uks minema, teine aga jaab auto alla. Blaketoni suureks rõõmuks uurib kriketilegend toa Aidensfieldi pubis.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Mare on Margna peale pahane ja otsib Johanneselt lohutust. Hiljem sõidab ta Uuevarikule isakodu vaatama, kuid Ülo vihastab ta valja. Jurka kohtub maal Peediantsu Maiega ja ehmatab Maret. Margna ja Ahven ootavad Tallinna Reisisadamas rootslasest aripartnerit, kes jaab aga tulemata. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

Vaikese Nelli vanemad ei suuda omavahel hakkama saada ning nende tuli paneb Sonjat taas oma elu ule mõtlema. Johanna pihib Lenitale, et ta ei soovi last, kuid ei oska seda kuidagi Maxile selgitada. Milla ja Antti uritavad iga hinna eest superkuu ajal last eostada.

programme.desc: Kiirekskursioon ETV arhiivides jatkub. Seekordne saade jatkab eelmisel nadalal pooleli jaanud meelelahutusteemat, vaatluse all on seitsmekumnendate lõpu ja kaheksakumnendate aastate ETV meelelahutustoostus.

programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Viimasel ajal on Soomaa veisekasvatajad olnud hadas sagenenud hundirunnakutega. Nuud on Keskkonnaamet valjastanud nuhtlusisendite kuttimiseks eriload, mille alusel saavad jahimehed lasta hunte ka sealsel looduskaitsealal. Uurime, milline on inimese roll selles konfliktis ja mis võiks olla lahenduseks. Tallinna loomaaia ninasarvik Elbat kimbutas hiljuti tõsine tervisemure, mistõttu loom kahjuks suri. Jalgisime loomaarstide tood, kui puuti selle võimsa looma tervisehada põhjust leida. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, režissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Planeedipaastjad
programme.desc: Planeedipaastmise eksperiment toob kaasa esimesed viljad - Kalle soostub liiklema uhistranspordiga! Karinit tabab seevastu kergekujuline okostress, sest pealtnaha lihtne ja selge ulesanne osutub argielus paris keerukaks. Saatejuht Kadi Jaanisoo-Kuld, režissoor Marten Vaher, toimetaja Marit Ummelas, produtsent Egle Beek.

programme.title: Metslased
programme.desc: Metslased on jõudnud korraks Harjumaale, Siidrifarmi. Peremees Aivar raagib, kuidas uks raamas laut uue ja vaarika elu sai. Kulastame ajuvaba betoonkolossi keset raba, mis kunagi valmis ei saanud, raagitakse, et selle ehitas uks jaapanlane endale tuumavarjendiks. Laev keset kuiva maad ja võitlus vasimusega. Kohtume taas Erki Vaikrega, kes viib meid maailmalõpu oaasi. Lisaks uusi tarkusi loodusest ja kasulikke matkanippe. Sarja autor Lemo.

programme.title: Wikmani poisid
programme.desc: Aasta 1938. Riks paaseb haiglast. Gumnasistidel seisavad ees eksamid ja laevareis Stockholmi. Stsenaristid Hugo Ader, Andres Maimik, Anu Soolep ja Vilja Palm. Režissoor-lavastaja Vilja Palm, juhtoperaator Aarne Kraam, kunstnik Tiiu Übi, helilooja Sven Grunberg, toimetaja Hanneli Reili.

programme.title: Suus sulav Eesti
programme.desc: Vahukoor, rostitud silmud, peedikrõpsud kõik uhes magustoidus. Ei kõla ahvatlevalt? Aga just sellise desserdiga kostitab Narva-Jõesuu peakokk Angelica Udekulli. Aga see ei jaa saate ainsaks ullatuseks. Saatejuht Angelica Udekull, toimetaja Robert Kõrvits, montaažirežissoor Vladlen Pobjaržin, produtsent Laura Kõrvits.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Sotsiaaltootaja Margit kulastab Annelit ja Taivot. Torim kutsub Annemai teatrisse. Mare annab Almale preemia. Oliver-Sten ja Raivo Tiik osalevad valimisdebatis.

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: "Maahommik" randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende põnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kõikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just "Maahommiku" saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, režissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Varastatud lootus: Armukelm
programme.desc: Juhuse tahtel kohtuvad Signe ja Eleri ning avastavad, et nende armas Tarmo on petis. Naiste enesekindlus ja õnn purunevad, kuid koos on seda koormat siiski kergem taluda. Kuid kas taluda ka luuasaamist või on sellest olukorrast siiski valjapaas? Kattemaksuplaani Tarmole asub orkestreerima kummalist rolli mangiv Mariliis. Osades Mart Avandi, Tiina Tauraite, Liina Vahtrik, Mirtel Pohla, Indrek Sammul, Gert Raudsep jpt. Idee autor ja režissoor Tambet Tuisk, operaator-lavastaja Ants Martin Vahur. Stsenaristid Livia Ulman, Andris Feldmanis ja Tambet Tuisk. Produtsent Jaan Laugamõts.

programme.title: Tippvormi(s)
programme.desc: Kas kolme kuuga on võimalik oma kesist vormi parandada ja sooritada kaitsevae kehaliste võimete kontrolltest? Kuidas kumme osalejat treeningutele vastu peavad, mismoodi teha esimesed sammud jõusaalis? Kas uldse on võimalik saavutada vormi jooksurajal, kui sa pole kunagi selles hea olnud? Seekord võõrustab meid Kaitseliit, valame higi, heidame koos Aleksander Tammertiga granaati ja selgub, kes osalejatest on osavaim laskur. Saatejuht ja produtsent Kaidor Kahar, treenerid Eneli Kutter ja Siim Tõnisson. Režissoor Tarvo Tammeoks, toimetaja Heleri All, monteerija Alar Nilov.

programme.title: Tahelepanu! Tegemist on teadusega
programme.desc: Miks on inimestel raske piiri pidada suhkruga, kuidas mõjutab vimm mõne erakonna vastu markamatult meie isiklikku elu või kuidas saab keskaegse inimese saareluust lugeda valja tema toitumisharjumused? Varske klipisari tutvustab Eesti teadlaste põnevaid uuringuid veterinaariast sotsioloogiani ja geneetikast kunstiteadusteni. Režissoorid Maarika Lauri ja Andres Lepasar, toimetajad Marit Ummelas ja Marit Valk.

programme.title: Jalgpalli Premium Liiga
programme.desc: Jalgpalli meistriliiga viimases voorus sõidab tiitli eest heitlev FC Flora kulla edukat hooaega tegevale Parnu Vaprusele.

programme.title: Pealtnagija
programme.desc: Kaheosaline dokumentaal, mis jutustab, kuidas nõukogude ajal Eesti NSV naiste murdmaakoondise juures alustanud usinast ja uuenduslikust eesti treenerist sai rahvusvahelise murdmaasuusatamise uks mõjukam ning tuntum spetsialist, kes tõstis sportlasi olumpiapjedestaalidele, aga havitas ka karjaare. Ta palvis tunnustust, auhindu ja kiitust, aga pettis samal ajal keeruliste kombinatsioonidega dopingukontrolle, sponsoreid ning spordisõpru. "Mati Alaver - valgusest varju" on traagiline lugu poorasest vaimustusest ja rangast pettumusest, mille telgitagustes peitub palju pooltoone ning fakte, mida uldsus esimest korda kuuleb. Autor-stsenarist Mihkel Karmas, režissoorid Raivo Maripuu, Vladlen Pobjaržin, toimetajad Kristjan Pihl, Taavi Eilat, Merilin Parli, Uljana Kuzmina, produtsent Piret Priisaar.

programme.title: Elu lugu
programme.desc: Kes on kariljonist? Selle ameti pidajaid pole just palju. Merle Kollomi kae labi kuuleme kellamangu Tartu Raekoja tornist. Kusib Aivi Parijõgi, režissoor Mati Kark.

programme.title: Klassikatahed
programme.desc: Klassikatahed

programme.title: Mammals
programme.desc: Imetajad elavad kõigil mandritel ja igas ookeanis, nii jaa- ja lumevaljadel kui ka kõige tihedamates džunglites, kõige kuumemates kõrbetes ning hamarates sugavikes. Sir David Attenborough tutvustab imetajate maailma ja nende erakordse edu saladusi; saame teada, millised katsumused neid meie enneolematult kiiresti muutuvas maailmas ees ootavad. 1. osa. Öine eluviis arenes valja juba dinosauruste ajal ja pea kaks kolmandikku imetajatest eelistab siiani tegutseda oositi.

programme.title: Pea ees vette. Tai Kuningriigis
programme.desc: Sel korral jõuavad Milderid Tai lahes asuvale Koh Phangani saarele, mis on kuulus oma legendaarsete taiskuupidude poolest, mida iseloomustavad neoonriietes pidutsejad ja ambritest joodav alkohol. Ka Piret, Egert ja Milli sukelduvad sellesse mollu. Lisaks tõmmatakse katte poksikindad, et teha tutvust maailma surmavamaks võitluskunstiks peetava tai poksiga. Režissoor Egert Milder, toimetaja Piret Jarvis-Milder. Tootja Kaks Vulkaani.

programme.title: Toiduteadlik
programme.desc: Toidulisandite riiulid on kauplustes ja apteekides meetrite pikkused. Millised on võtted, millega meid puutakse neid ostma meelitada, raagib kaitumisteadlane Heidi Reinson.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Klassikatahed
programme.desc: Parast kuut pingelist võistlusnadalat on kaes „Klassikatahtede“ suur finaal, kus kõik võistlejad astuvad solistina Eesti Riikliku Sumfooniaorkestri ette. Estonia kontserdisaalis tuleb suure sumfooniaorkestriga koos esinedes võita nii publiku kui ka žurii poolehoid, sest mangus on ei rohkem ega vahem kui „Klassikatahed 2025“ võitja tiitel. Finaalkontserti dirigeerib Andres Kaljuste, saatejuht on Johan Randvere ja režissoor Krista Luts. Saateformaadi autorid on Helen Valkna, Anu Valba ja Timo Steiner. Konkurss „Klassikatahed“ sunnib Eesti Televisiooni, Klassikaraadio, Eesti Kontserdi ja Kultuuripartnerlus SA koostoos.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Ints ja Mats klaarivad Annemaiga arveid. Anu kaib beebiga Maret hairimas. Jane ja Mari kurdavad Allanile, et neil on liiga palju lusitaania tigusid. Iiris ja Siim tahavad Are abi pulma korraldamisel.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport. Sport
programme.desc: Sport. Sport

programme.title: Varastatud lootus: Armukelm
programme.desc: Petetud on raske olla. Signe ja Eleri puuavad oma eluga edasi minna, kuid Tarmo ei lase oma ohvritest nii kergelt lahti. Ikka ja jalle satub naiste teele tõkkeid, mis ei lase neil unustada Tarmot ja tema skeemitamisi. Samal ajal aga puuavad naised etendada naitemangu Mariliisi seatud lavastuses, mis peab lõppema Tarmo luuasaamisega. Osades Mart Avandi, Tiina Tauraite, Liina Vahtrik, Mirtel Pohla, Indrek Sammul, Gert Raudsep jpt. Idee autor ja režissoor Tambet Tuisk, operaator-lavastaja Ants Martin Vahur. Stsenaristid Livia Ulman, Andris Feldmanis ja Tambet Tuisk. Produtsent Jaan Laugamõts.

programme.title: The Old Oak
programme.desc: Parast kaevanduse sulgemist veereb elu Kirde-Inglismaa pisilinnas allamage. Endist aega meenutab vaid pubi Vana Tamm, mida selle omanik TJ Ballantyne (Dave Turner) puuab kaigus hoida. Kuna inimesed lahkuvad oma kodukohast ja majad on odavalt saadaval, on haabuv linnake ideaalseks kohaks Suuria põgenikele. Pagulaste seas on ka neiu Yara (Ebla Mari), kel tekib sõbrasuhe pubiomaniku TJ-ga. Koos puutakse rajada silda kohalike ja Suuria põgenike vahel. Sotsiaalrealismi klassiku, vanameister Ken Loachi viimane film. Kuldse Palmioksa nominent Cannesi festivalil. R: Ken Loach.

programme.title: Võta või jata
programme.desc: Estonian film about a 30-year-old builder, Erik, who discovers on a quiet Saturday morning that his ex-girlfriend Moonika has given birth to their child, leading him on a comedic and challenging journey of becoming an unexpected everyday hero and father.

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: Mount Edenis vallandub tõeline kaos. Grace puuab Henryt Lee kontrolli alt vabastada. Happy kuuleb viimaks tõde.

programme.desc: Television pisimpaan jatkuneen draamasarjan, "Kovan lain", luojalta ruutuun saapuu nyt vaikuttava sarja, joka kertoo New Yorkin poliisivoimien SVU-erityisyksikon elamasta ja tyosta. Kussakin jaksossa seuraamme rikosetsiva Elliot Stableria, Olivia Bensonia, John Munchia seka Odafin Tutuolaa, kun he yrittavat ratkaista kaupungin mutkikkaimpia rikoksia. He seuraavat kutakin johtolankaa, eivatka lepaa ennen kuin saavat oikeutta viattomille uhreille ja paljastavat totuuden.

programme.title: Mentalisti
programme.desc: Jane huomaa epailyttavan nakoisen miehen tuovan aseen poliittiseen puhetilaisuuteen ja aikoo todistaa, etta kyseessa on psykopaatti, joka aikoo tehda murhan. Silla valin Lisbon tutkii valokuvaajan kuolemaa, joka on sattunut samassa tilaisuudessa.

programme.desc: Lukiolaisurheilija loytyy murhattuna makuuhuoneestaan Teksasista. Etsivat saavat selville, etta han piilotteli salaisuutta, joka johtaa tappajan luo.
